## PlaybackControlRequest interface

Playback control requests come from either remote control buttons or on screen buttons. These are events like next, previous, resume &amp; pause.

See [https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/docs/custom-playbackcontroller-interface-reference\#requests](https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/docs/custom-playbackcontroller-interface-reference#requests)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PlaybackControlRequest extends BaseRequest 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseRequest](./stentor-models.baserequest.md)
